testcase.name: And Click on GenerateInvoice button
testcase.classname: Scenario: 3. Generate Invoice for entire class where Invoice is already generated for few childs.

testcase.name: Then Verify the successful alert message as "Invoice for some of Child(s) in this Class has been already generated for the selected month. Please Generate Invoice Individually for other records."
testcase.classname: Scenario: 3. Generate Invoice for entire class where Invoice is already generated for few childs.
